message: Hi Bob, thanks for your interest in the product.  After careful consideration, I'm offering it to you at $2,200,000. I believe this price reflects the true value and potential of what's being offered. Let me know what you think.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but $2,200,000 is significantly above my budget.  I'm very interested in the product, but I can only go up to $800,000 at this time.  This is my best and final offer.
